rows.english: Amen, Amen, come
My faithful Lord, Jesus Christ!
Amen, Amen, come
Our hearts are yearning for the flight!
We're waiting for you
As you have promised
We see Thy glory,
In the delightful clouds,
You've made us like you,
In a quick twinkle of an eye.
We're waiting for you
As you have promised
The sight would cheer us,
We see Thy wounds and thy scars;
As You draw near us,
Signs of Your love fill our eyes.
We're waiting for you
As you have promised
Around our Groom there
We rejoice and be glad,
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Nafrah wa naskun fee kull heen
rows.arabic: نفرح ونكون معك في كل حين

rows.english: With the redeemed church,
The greatest love and joy ever.
We're waiting for you
As you have promised
No more sorrow,
No more pain, nor tears,
The Lord our comfort,
Our hearts and souls He cheers,
We're waiting for you
As you have promised
There shall be no night,
No candle needed nor a sun,
Our Lord and Savior
Gives us Himself, the True Light.
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya helw ya tayyib ya ameen
rows.arabic: يا حلو يا طيب يا أمين

rows.english: We're waiting for you
As you have promised
Be faithful unto death, and I will give you the crown of life (x2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Kun ameenan ila al-mawt fa sa'oteek ikleel al-hayat
rows.arabic: كن أميناً إلى الموت فسأعطيك إكليل الحياة

rows.english: Soon I come, soon I come, soon I come as the thief!
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati saree'an ha ana aati kal-liss
rows.arabic: ها أنا آت سريعاً ها أنا آت كلص

rows.english: And I will give him who thirsts from the water of life
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati al-atshan min yanboo' maa' al-hayat
rows.arabic: ها أنا أعطي العطشان من ينبوع ماء الحياة

rows.english: He who overcomes shall eat, from the tree of life
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Man yaghlib sayakul min shajarat al-hayat
rows.arabic: من يغلب سيأكل من شجرة الحياة

rows.english: The tree, in the midst of the Lord´s paradise (x2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Shajarat qaimah fee wasat firdaws Allah
rows.arabic: شجرة قائمة في وسط فردوس الله

rows.english: Be faithful unto death, and I will give you the crown of life (x2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Kun ameenan ila al-mawt fa sa'oteek ikleel al-hayat
rows.arabic: كن أميناً إلى الموت فسأعطيك إكليل الحياة

rows.english: Soon I come, soon I come, soon I come as the thief!
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati saree'an ha ana aati kal-liss
rows.arabic: ها أنا آت سريعاً ها أنا آت كلص

rows.english: And I will give him who thirsts from the water of life
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati al-atshan min yanboo' maa' al-hayat
rows.arabic: ها أنا أعطي العطشان من ينبوع ماء الحياة

rows.english: He who overcomes and keeps my words till the end
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Man yaghlib wa yahfath lil-nihayah a'mali

rows.english: I will give power to rule nations with an iron rod (x2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Sultan sa'oteeh limalik kull ma li
rows.arabic: سلطاناً سأعطيه ليملك كل ما لي

rows.english: Be faithful unto death, and I will give you the crown of life (x2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Kun ameenan ila al-mawt fa sa'oteek ikleel al-hayat
rows.arabic: كن أميناً إلى الموت فسأعطيك إكليل الحياة

rows.english: Soon I come, soon I come, soon I come as the thief!
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati saree'an ha ana aati kal-liss
rows.arabic: ها أنا آت سريعاً ها أنا آت كلص

rows.english: And I will give him who thirsts from the water of life
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati al-atshan min yanboo' maa' al-hayat
rows.arabic: ها أنا أعطي العطشان من ينبوع ماء الحياة

rows.english: He who overcomes shall not be hurt by the second death
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Man yaghlib a'taraf bihi qadam abi
rows.arabic: من يغلب أعترف به قدام أبي

rows.english: His name, his name, before my Father I confess (x2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Man yaghlib fala yo'zihi thak al-mawt al-thani
rows.arabic: من يغلب فلا يؤذيه ذاك الموت السني

rows.english: Be faithful unto death, and I will give you the crown of life (x2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Kun ameenan ila al-mawt fa sa'oteek ikleel al-hayat
rows.arabic: كن أميناً إلى الموت فسأعطيك إكليل الحياة

rows.english: Soon I come, soon I come, soon I come as the thief!
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati saree'an ha ana aati kal-liss
rows.arabic: ها أنا آت سريعاً ها أنا آت كلص

rows.english: And I will give him who thirsts from the water of life
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati al-atshan min yanboo' maa' al-hayat
rows.arabic: ها أنا أعطي العطشان من ينبوع ماء الحياة

rows.english: He who overcomes I will write on him my new name
He who overcomes shall sit with me on my throne (x2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Yawma urs lil-kharouf yawma majd fee al-sama'
rows.arabic: يوم عرس للخروف يوم مجد في السماء

rows.english: Be faithful unto death, and I will give you the crown of life (x2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Kun ameenan ila al-mawt fa sa'oteek ikleel al-hayat
rows.arabic: كن أميناً إلى الموت فسأعطيك إكليل الحياة

rows.english: Soon I come, soon I come, soon I come as the thief!
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati saree'an ha ana aati kal-liss
rows.arabic: ها أنا آت سريعاً ها أنا آت كلص

rows.english: And I will give him who thirsts from the water of life
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ha ana aati al-atshan min yanboo' maa' al-hayat
rows.arabic: ها أنا أعطي العطشان من ينبوع ماء الحياة

rows.english: Blessed are you Mary
Rod of Aaron,
the dome of Moses,
Aaron’s censor.
Your glory O Mary
is above the heavens.
You gave birth to the Savior
He gave you all honor. (x2)
Blessed are you Mary
Rod of Aaron,
the dome of Moses,
Aaron’s censor.
Your glory O Mary
exceeded the heavenlies.
You’re exalted above the cherubim
and above the seraphim. (x2)
Blessed are you Mary
Rod of Aaron,
the dome of Moses,
Aaron’s censor.
Your glory O Mary
shines in the highest,
for you are the Mother of God
who came and redeemed us. (x2)
Blessed are you Mary
Rod of Aaron,
the dome of Moses,
Aaron’s censor.
Your glory O Mary
is over all generation.
You are the second heaven,
Mother of the Great King
Blessed are you Mary
Rod of Aaron,
the dome of Moses,
Aaron’s censor.
No don't leave me alone, O my faithful shepherd.
rows.enPhonicsSongs: La la tatrukni wahdi ya ra'i al-ameen
rows.arabic: لا لا تتركني وحدي يا راعي الأمين

rows.english: Guide me dear master and be unto me a helper.
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Qudni anta Rabbi wa sir ma'ee ya mu'een
rows.arabic: قدني أنت ربي وسر معي يا معين

rows.english: (I am o Lord without you nothing at all) (2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ana ya Rab doonak la shay' abadan (2)
rows.arabic: أنا يا رب دونك لا شئ أبدا (2)

rows.english: (So take my right hand O Lord and guide me in your way forever) (2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Fa amsik yameeni Rabbi wa ahdini fee tareeqi da'iman
rows.arabic: فامسك يميني ربي واهدني في طريقي دائما

rows.english: And don't leave me alone in the midst of this darkness
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Wa la tatrukni wahdi fee wasat al-zalam
rows.arabic: ولا تتركني وحدي في وسط الظلام

rows.english: Let your bright face guide me O Lord unto peace.
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ij'al wajhak yaqooduni ya Rab lil-salaam
rows.arabic: إجعل وجهك يقودني يا رب للسلام

rows.english: (I am o Lord without you nothing at all) (2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ana ya Rab doonak la shay' abadan (2)
rows.arabic: أنا يا رب دونك لا شئ أبدا (2)

rows.english: (So take my right hand O Lord and guide me in your way forever) (2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Fa amsik yameeni Rabbi wa ahdini fee tareeqi da'iman
rows.arabic: فامسك يميني ربي واهدني في طريقي دائما

rows.english: And don't leave me alone but hear my prayers
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Wa la tatrukni wahdi bal isma' salati
rows.arabic: ولا تتركني وحدي بل اسمع صلاتي

rows.english: And be there for me redeemer for the rest of my life
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Waqif anta bijanibi Rabbi kul hayati
rows.arabic: وقف أنت بجانبي ربي كل حياتي

rows.english: (I am o Lord without you nothing at all) (2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ana ya Rab doonak la shay' abadan (2)
rows.arabic: أنا يا رب دونك لا شئ أبدا (2)

rows.english: (So take my right hand O Lord and guide me in your way forever) (2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Fa amsik yameeni Rabbi wa ahdini fee tareeqi da'iman
rows.arabic: فامسك يميني ربي واهدني في طريقي دائما

rows.english: And don't leave me alone because of my sins
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Wa la tatrukni wahdi min ajl khatayaya
rows.arabic: ولا تتركني وحدي من أجل خطاياي

rows.english: (I am o Lord without you nothing at all) (2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ana ya Rab doonak la shay' abadan (2)
rows.arabic: أنا يا رب دونك لا شئ أبدا (2)

rows.english: (So take my right hand O Lord and guide me in your way forever) (2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Fa amsik yameeni Rabbi wa ahdini fee tareeqi da'iman
rows.arabic: فامسك يميني ربي واهدني في طريقي دائما

rows.english: No don't leave me alone in the midst of this world
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Wa la tatrukni wahdi fee wasat al-khata
rows.arabic: ولا تتركني وحدي في وسط الخطاة

rows.english: But Come quickly O Lord and take me to heaven
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Bal ta'al ya Rabbi wakhudhni lil-sama
rows.arabic: بل تعال يا ربي وخذني للسما

rows.english: (I am o Lord without you nothing at all) (2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ana ya Rab doonak la shay' abadan (2)
rows.arabic: أنا يا رب دونك لا شئ أبدا (2)

rows.english: (So take my right hand O Lord and guide me in your way forever) (2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Fa amsik yameeni Rabbi wa ahdini fee tareeqi da'iman
rows.arabic: فامسك يميني ربي واهدني في طريقي دائما

english_title: Draw a portrait of the Virgin

rows.english: Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
carrying her Son the Christ.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
offer unto her the praise.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
draw it with the brightest colors.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for she is the source of gentleness.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and overlay it with gold.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son was crucified.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
that is ornamented with rubies.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son defeated death.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and adorn her with priceless treasures.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son, He is the way.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and overlay it with gold.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son was crucified.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
frame it with the precious stones.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
so the Light of our faith shines.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
with her crown of sacred pearls.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
the mother of the Kings of ages.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and overlay it with gold.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son was crucified.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
shroud her with the purest diamonds
Put her on a beautiful icon,
one from which the devil flees.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and engrave her on the wood.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
mother of the Lord of lords.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and overlay it with gold.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son was crucified.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
on the wooden olive branch.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
the Virgin who lights our eyes.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
decorate her O wise virgins.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
mother of the Alpha and the Omega.
Draw a portrait of the Virgin,
and overlay it with gold.
Put her on a beautiful icon,
for her Son was crucified.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
She has born unto us,
the Savior of the world.
He came and saved our souls,
And forgave us our sins.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
She's the lady and the Virgin,
Our queen in heaven.
She's above the Cherubim,
And praised by the Seraphim.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
She is famous and well known,
As the best shelter to rest.
Try her and you'll find that,
For your help she's always there.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
Please O Mary, pray for us
And the sinners to return.
Teach us and guide all of us,
For you are the faithful saint.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.
Hail to Mary, Mother of God.
Everywhere you see the sun,
Glorify her, magnify her.
Put her always in your heart.

english_title: Hail to you O Mother of comfort

rows.english: Hail to you O Mother of comfort
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Salamna elekee ya om el ma3oona

rows.english: O pure rampart of salvation O compassionate mother (x2)
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya tahra ya soor el khalas ya 7anoona
rows.arabic: يا طاهره يا سور الخلاص يا حنونه

rows.english: It is always our pleasure to praise your virtues
and turn always to you seeking your help.
Who among the people whose heart is more merciful
rows.arabic: مين في البشر قلبه أحنى علينا

rows.english: and whose passions support us in all our life steps. (x2)
Who truly rejoice if we rejoice
and is saddened if we are sad.
rows.enPhonicsSongs: We ye7zan eza el7ozn geh nawa7eena
rows.arabic: و يحزن إذا الحزن جه نواحينا

rows.english: Matthias the Lord's apostle during his imprisonment
rows.enPhonicsSongs: We metias rasool elmasee7 wa’t segno

rows.english: you asked on his behalf before the Almighty God. (x2)
An amazing thing happened the steel melted
rows.arabic: حصل أمر هايل بقي الصلب سايل

rows.english: and your intercession brought peace and safety for him.
He asked for your intercession our father Anba Abraam ibn Zaraa
And his prayers were answered quickly and greatly. (x2)
You delivered him out of distress and moved the Mount of Makatam
with the greatest miracle recorded in history.
rows.arabic: بآيه لها في التاريخ أي روعة

rows.english: At the church of Zeitun you blessed us
rows.enPhonicsSongs: We lamma kona fee keneeset elzatoon barekteena
rows.arabic: ولما كنا في كنيسة الزيتون باركتينا

rows.english: and we felt peace and great joy in us. (x2)
You brought to the sick heavenly healing
and to the sad souls great comfort.
Hear my cry, I pray to thee,
And to my voice incline your ear,
Hold me and have mercy on me,
For you O Lord I'm in great need.
My soul is troubled in the deep,
And my eyes are full of tears,
Now I remember you indeed,
For your salvation is near.
Hear my cry, I pray to thee,
And to my voice incline your ear,
Hold me and have mercy on me,
For you O Lord I'm in great need.
All the waves came upon me,
I was drowned in the deep sea,
I asked for help where it could be,
But in the hands of my Lord dear.
Hear my cry, I pray to thee,
And to my voice incline your ear,
Hold me and have mercy on me,
For you O Lord I'm in great need.
My heart is trembling in great fear,
And my head is wrapped in weeds,
Out of the depth I cried to Thee,
Save my soul and set me free.
Hear my cry, I pray to thee,
And to my voice incline your ear,
Hold me and have mercy on me,
For you O Lord I'm in great need.
God ordered the whale in the sea,
To safely drop Jonah in peace,
In the whale's belly Jonah kneeled,
And thanked the Lord for His great deed.
Hear my cry, I pray to thee,
And to my voice incline your ear,
Hold me and have mercy on me,
For you O Lord I'm in great need.
How could I forget, the One who died for me
How could I forget His side that had to bleed
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Kayfa ansa dam dhi al-janb al-jareeh
rows.arabic: كيف آنسي دم ذي الجنب الجريح

rows.english: He who saw me in my misery so He came running to meet me
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Man raani fee hawani fa'ata taw'an ilayya
rows.arabic: من راني في هواني فآتى طوعا آلي

rows.english: He who bought me and redeemed me broke my chains and set me free
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Man fadayni washtarani kasiran qayd yadi
rows.arabic: من فدانى واشتراني كاسرا قيد يدي

rows.english: How could I forget your kindness through the years
Your right hand always reaching out to me
In my joys and in my sorrows, in all of life's storms
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Waqt huzni wa waqt deeqi wasat amwaj al-hayat
rows.arabic: وقت حزني وقت ضيقي وسط أمواج الحياة

rows.english: You've become my friend and fortress, You are the One to whom I call
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Surt hisni wa rafeeqi surt lee bab al-najat
rows.arabic: صرت حصني ورفيقي صرت لي باب النجاة

rows.english: Help me Lord I want to lose myself in You
All my pride has blinded me from seeing You
So I'll keep watching and praying setting my eyes on You
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ughni fee hayati aaliman anni ghareeb
rows.arabic: أغنى في حياتي عالما آني غريب

rows.english: Trusting in your sure promises that You will be there for me soon
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Dhakiran annaka rabbi sawfa ta'ti an qareeb
rows.arabic: ذاكرا انك ربى سوف تأتى عن قريب

rows.english: How lovely it is to get together
In love our Lord teaches us
When two meet in my name together
I will always be in between their gather
O Lord come now and join us here
We ask you to come and give us cheer
Fill us with joy from your Holy Spirit
And peace no riches can provide
The Lord is here always with us
How lovely he is, how content we are
We talk to him and he always listens
He'll always be with us in us
O Lord come now and join us here
We ask you to come and give us cheer
Fill us with joy from your Holy Spirit
And peace no riches can provide
O Lord come now and join us here
We ask you to come and give us cheer
Fill us with joy from your Holy Spirit
And peace no riches can provide

english_title: How Sweet You Are O Mary
arabic_title: ما أحلاكِ يا مريم ما أحلاك

rows.english: How sweet you are O Mary.
rows.arabic: ما أحلاكِ يا مريم ما أحلاك

rows.english: You carried the Light in your womb.
He chose your beauty and your splendor.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
You carried the redeemer of the world.
You gave birth to the Creator of the world.
You nursed the Lord of the creation.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
How sweet you are O Mary.
rows.arabic: ما أحلاكِ يا مريم ما أحلاك

rows.english: You carried the Light in your womb.
He chose your beauty and your splendor.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
You became the mother of your creator.
How can I describe your meanings?
He is your Son and your Redeemer.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
How sweet you are O Mary.
rows.arabic: ما أحلاكِ يا مريم ما أحلاكِ

rows.english: You carried the Light in your womb.
He chose your beauty and your splendor.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
Ask and intercede for us O Virgin
before your Lord, the Almighty God.
Your intercession will give us victory.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
How sweet you are O Mary.
rows.arabic: ما أحلاكِ يا مريم ما أحلاك

rows.english: You carried the Light in your womb.
He chose your beauty and your splendor.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
You are a treasure of grace, O my mother the Virgin.
I praise you, O my pure lady.
Your praises and comfort and triumph.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2
How sweet you are O Mary.
rows.arabic: ما أحلاكِ يا مريم ما أحلاك

rows.english: You carried the Light in your womb.
He chose your beauty and your splendor.
(Blessed are you O Mary, blessed are you.) x2

english_title: I Can Hear My Savior Calling

rows.english: Where He leads me I will follow
I will go, with Him all the way
If He leads me to crucifixion
I will go, with Him all the way
If He leads me to the judgment
I will go, with Him all the way
If in war or in peace
I will go, with Him all the way
If in health or in sickness
I will go, with Him all the way
If I am beaten or afflicted
I will go, with Him all the way
If in jail or in chains
I will go, with Him all the way
He will lead me to grace and glory
I will go, with Him all the way
I place my soul into your hands
My Lord Jesus Christ
Lead me because I depend on you
Lead me and I´ll serve you
Please be my guide in everyway
Be my guard I won´t go astray
Sanctify my heart and my needs
Until I see you Lord
As you have always said
All sorts of all goodness
"Come unto me all you weary
Come unto me and you will find rest
Come unto me I am the way
I am the truth and life"
When my life gets filled with worries
And darkness overwhelms
The clouds will be dispersed away
By you, O prince of peace
You are my shield you are my hope
You are my strengths you are my go
You are the perfect love, O Lord
Of whom then shall I fear!
As you have always said
All sorts of all goodness
"Come unto me all you weary
Come unto me and you will find rest
Come unto me I am the way
I am the truth and life"
When worries overwhelm my life
Or darkness closes in
The clouds will be dispersed away
By you, O prince of peace
The Lord is my shield, my hope
The Lord will do as He has said
His love is complete, O Lord
So I see you, Lord Jesus
As you have always said
All sorts of all goodness
"Come unto me all you weary
Come unto me and you will find rest
Come unto me I am the way
I am the truth and life"

english_title: In the Shade of Your Protection

rows.english: In the shade of your protection
we take refuge, O Mary.
Don’t turn our prayer away,
whenever we call you.
O the pride of the human race,
the best of people are you.
O you river of gifts
that flows into the world.
In the shade of your protection
we take refuge, O Mary.
Don’t turn our prayer away,
whenever we call you.
O you gate of heaven,
Mother of our Redeemer,
O you are our hope,
and the sweetest name we call.
In the shade of your protection
we take refuge, O Mary.
Don’t turn our prayer away,
whenever we call you.
Intercede for your people.
Pray at all times.
We are asking your Son,
with the spirit of children.
In the shade of your protection
we take refuge, O Mary.
Don’t turn our prayer away,
whenever we call you.
Have mercy on your servants
They remain faithful
They seek evermore
From you at all times
In the shade of your protection
we take refuge, O Mary.
Don’t turn our prayer away,
whenever we call you.
O God, My God, Why have you gone from me
Far from my prayers, far from my cry
To you I call, but you never answer me
You send no comfort and I don't know why
Into Your Hands, We commend our spirits O Lord
Into Your Hands, We commend our hearts
For we must die to ourselves in loving You
Into Your Hands we commend our love
Our fathers trusted and You delivered them
To You they cry, and they escaped
In You they trusted when darkness came their way
And in Your goodness You made them free
Into Your Hands, We commend our spirits O Lord
Into Your Hands, We commend our hearts
For we must die to ourselves in loving You
Into Your Hands we commend our love
You've been my guide since I was very young
You showed the way when I needed someone's hand
But now I'm lonely, nobody is at my side
Stay near my Lord, and be my friend.
Into Your Hands, We commend our spirits O Lord
Into Your Hands, We commend our hearts
For we must die to ourselves in loving You
Into Your Hands we commend our love
Just like the bird when it found its home,
Just like the happy dove,
Your house O Lord, I love
Your house I love with honesty.
Your house is prayer, praise, and candles,
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Baytak salat wa tahleel wa shumu'

rows.english: Your house is Love, Light, and Peace,
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Baytak mahabbah wa noor wa salam

rows.english: Just as I love your house O Lord
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Zay ma habeet baytak ya Yasouh
rows.arabic: زي ما حبيت بيتك يا يسوع

rows.english: I Love You unto the end of day
Just like the bird when it found its home,
Just like the happy dove,
Your house O Lord, I love
Your house I love with honesty.
Your house is full of blessings,
Protected against all demons.
We celebrate there the liturgies,
They’re prayed for the saints.
Just like the bird when it found its home,
Just like the happy dove,
Your house O Lord, I love
Your house I love with honesty.
In Your house we read the Bible
And learn there the nicest songs.
And hear there the blessed hymns,
And praise You all our lives.
Just like the bird when it found its home,
Just like the happy dove,
Your house O Lord, I love
Your house I love with honesty.
Blessed are they who are blameless,
O Lord in Your house living.
Confirm me in Your luminous ways,
Forever and ever, Amen.
Just like the bird when it found its home,
Just like the happy dove,
Your house O Lord, I love
Your house I love with honesty.
My Coptic Church. The church of the Lord
Ancient and Strong, I wish her long life
In the early years, After the birth of Christ
St. Mark came bearing, The light of the true faith
rows.arabic: مر قس أتى بنور إيمانه الصحيح

rows.english: He dwelt in the land, proclaiming salvation
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Wa 7alla fel belade, yonadee bel khalas
rows.arabic: و جال في البلاد ينادى بالخلاص

rows.english: In the name of our Redeemer, Christ who removed our sins
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Besmel masee7 el fadi, man yarfa3ol qasas
rows.arabic: بإسم المسيح الفادى من يرفع القصاص

rows.english: The Copts then believed, in the Lord Jesus
And Joy filled all the cities of Egypt
rows.arabic: و حل الاغتباط في كافة الربوع

rows.english: In a very very short time, He abolished all idols
rows.arabic: في أمد قريب قد حطموا الأوثان

rows.english: The cross was exalted, the sign of the faith
rows.arabic: و ارتفع الصليب و راية الإيمان

rows.english: Satan quickly rose, to war the Son of God
rows.arabic: إبليس حالا قام يحارب ابن الله

rows.english: He stirred the rulers, emperors and armies
rows.arabic: فهيج الحكام و الجند و الولاة

rows.english: He then declared war, on the sons of the faith
Deny your Christ, or be thrown in the fire
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Hayya enkerol masee7a, aw tolqo fel neeran
rows.arabic: هيا انكروا المسيح أو تلقوا في النيران

rows.english: Our honored fathers, elders and youngsters
Were not moved by pain, distress nor dishonor
rows.arabic: لم يثنهم آلام و شدة و عار

rows.english: But said courageously, forward no turning back
rows.arabic: بل قالوا بانتصار للخلف لا رجوع

rows.english: We don't fear fire, Our Lord is Jesus Christ
rows.enPhonicsSongs: La nagza3o men naren, elahona yasoo3
rows.arabic: لا نجزع من نار إلهنا يسوع

rows.english: They were beaten and imprisoned, they lived in oppression
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Kam dorebo kam sogeno, kam 3asho fekte’ab
rows.arabic: كم ضربوا كم سجنوا كم عاشوا في اكتئاب

rows.english: They were burned and killed, and tasted every pain
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Kam qotelo kam 7oreqo, kam zaqo men 3azab
rows.arabic: كم قتلوا كم حرقوا كم ذاقوا من عذاب

rows.english: By the power of their faith, they overcame their pains
And remained believing in, the King of Peace
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Wa damo thabeteen, fee malekel salam
rows.arabic: و داموا ثابتين في ملك السلام

rows.english: With blood and suffering, they bought the faith
rows.arabic: بالدم و العناء قد اشتروا الإيمان

rows.english: And preserved it for us, in the name of Our Savior
rows.arabic: و احتفظوا لنا بإسم الفادي الرحمن

rows.english: Let us all rise, from our laziness
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Haya bena naqoom, men shedatel kasal
rows.arabic: هيا بنا نقوم من شدة الكسل

rows.english: With diligence seeking, the heavenly rewards
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Wa lel3ola naroom, wa nas3a bel3agal
rows.arabic: و للعلى نروم و نسعى بالعجل

rows.english: The Church of the Fathers, you are our pride
To her success, let us all join together
My Coptic Church, her faith is orthodox
Forever strong, Egypt is Christ's
rows.arabic: إلى الأبد قوية يا مصر للمسيح

rows.english: My Coptic Church so great
You spread the Christian faith
In the Ethiopian country
In Nubia and Sudan
In the Western nations
In the African continent
And in European cities
You witnessed for the faith
O Coptic Church of God
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya kenisa ya qaweya ya madinat el-salat
rows.arabic: يا كنيسة يا قوية يا مدينة الصلاة

rows.english: Persecuted but survived
In the council of Nicea
Heresies, you stood against
Your deacon Athanasius
He is the hero of faith
St. Clement and St. Oregon
St. Cyril and St. Dioscorus
St.Paul and St. Anthony
Your men that were so brave
O Coptic Church of God
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya kenisa ya qaweya ya madinat el-salat
rows.arabic: يا كنيسة يا قوية يا مدينة الصلاة

rows.english: Persecuted but survived
A church and a monastery
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Kenisa wa dayr wa mazbah wa heber
rows.arabic: كنيسة و دير و مذبح و حبر

rows.english: An altar and a sanctuary
Your sacraments are seven
They lead us up to heaven
By powers so divine
By prayers and by strife
O Coptic Church of God
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya kenisa ya qaweya ya madinat el-salat
rows.arabic: يا كنيسة يا قوية يا مدينة الصلاة

rows.english: Persecuted but survived
Jesus Christ visited you
With His mother St. Mary
St. Mark’s blood so pure
Watered you with the faith
O Mother of the Martyrs
St. George and St. Demiana
And the blessed St. Peter
The seal of the martyrs
O Coptic Church of God
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya kenisa ya qaweya ya madinat el-salat
rows.arabic: يا كنيسة يا قوية يا مدينة الصلاة

rows.english: Persecuted but survived
O Beloved, O Beloved, nailed unto the cross for me
rows.arabic: وا حبيبي وآ حبيبي، أي حال أنت فيه

rows.english: O what sin hast Thou committed, Thou who callest all to be.
rows.arabic: من شجاك من سقاك، كأس خل ترتضيه

rows.english: O Beloved, wish that I could spend the rest of life with Thee
rows.arabic: يا حبيبي أي ذنب، قد صنعت أو كريه

rows.english: Worshipping Thine Holy Passion, crucifying the flesh for Thee.
rows.arabic: أنت مجهود جريح، ليس فيك من شفاء

rows.english: Daughter of Zion behold Me, stricken and smitten for Thee
rows.arabic: بنت صهيون انظريني، غارقا في ذي اللجج

rows.english: Friend and kin, me have forsaken, there is none to comfort Me.
rows.arabic: قد تركت و خذلت، و البلا كبدي ولج

rows.english: All alone I’ll tread the winepress, all alone I’ll drink the cup
rows.arabic: لا صديق لا و لا مِن، انسبائي مَن خرج

rows.english: Shedding My blood for thee to ransom, and My flesh for thee to sup.
rows.arabic: كي يذود العار عنى، ويُسَلي المُبتلى

rows.english: I was bound and I was smitten, and they did spit in my face
rows.arabic: قد ربطت و ضربت، مثل أدنى المرذولين

rows.english: I was stripped and I was scourged, I was condemned in your place.
rows.arabic: بسياط قد جلدت، مثل شر المجرمين

rows.english: Your sins became My crown of thorns, O that you would understand
rows.arabic: كل هذا من جراكم، كي تكونوا فرحين

rows.english: Every time you sin anew, it’s one more nail in My hand.
rows.arabic: فانظروني هل رأيتم، مثل سقمي في الورى

rows.english: Like a lamb brought to the slaughter, like a dumb sheep to be sheered
rows.arabic: رحت في البستان ليلا، والحشى مني أضطرب

rows.english: King, Creator, Lord, and Master, by His creatures mocked and jeered.
rows.arabic: خفت صليت ضجرت، و الطلا منى انسكب

rows.english: Despised, rejected with grief acquainted, and of men was not esteemed
rows.arabic: قلت ربى إن رأيت، فادفعن عنى العطب

rows.english: Bruised and wounded, sore afflicted, yet with His stripes we were healed.
rows.arabic: حزن نفسي لا يماثل، بغريق في الطمى

rows.english: Lord, create in us a fountain that with tears will ever flow
And a heart contrite and broken, and a Spirit within renew.
rows.arabic: كل عوني فر عنى، مثل إنسان غريب

rows.english: O that we could shed the tears over Thy feet pierced and bruised
rows.arabic: فناديت و طلبت، مبدع الكون الرقيب

rows.english: O that we always remember, for our sins Thou were abused.
rows.arabic: أعقب الظلم إنخذالى، و اضطراب و بكاء
يا يسوع اجر فينا، سيل دمع منهمر
يلتظ القلب بنار، حزن قلب منكسر
ليتنا طول الليالي، ندما نهمى الدماء

english_title: O Mary our Mother, the Beloved of Us All

rows.english: O Mary our mother,
the beloved of us all. (x2)
O tender Virgin,
full of help for those who call.
You’re a symbol of purity
a guiding light of virginity. (x2)
You’re the merciful mother,
(O Servant of the great Lord) x2
O Mary our mother,
the beloved of us all. (x2)
O tender Virgin,
full of help for those who call.
You bore the beloved son
who saved us on the cross. (x2)
Intercede on our behalf,
(that He may forgive us our sins.) x2
O Mary our mother,
the beloved of us all. (x2)
O tender Virgin,
full of help for those who call.
We see our mother the Virgin,
the queen, the beloved of us all.) x2
Intercede on our behalf.
(Lift our prayers to the Lord.) x2
O Mary our mother,
the beloved of us all. (x2)
O tender Virgin,
full of help for those who call.
You performed miracles,
gave us comfort in distress. (x2)
You brought joy to the broken hearts,
(and healed those who suffered.) x2
O Mary our mother,
the beloved of us all. (x2)
O tender Virgin,
full of help for those who call.
You’re my shelter and support;
you enlighten all my thoughts. (x2)
Steer our hearts on the right path.
(Intercede for our people.) x2
O Mary our mother,
the beloved of us all. (x2)
O tender Virgin,
full of help for those who call.

english_title: O Mary our Mother, You’re the Mother of our Lord

rows.english: O Mary our Mother,
you’re the Mother of our Lord. (x2)
Intercede on our behalf,
O the Intercessor of us all (x2)
O Mary our Mother (x2)
O Jesus Christ your Son,
receives all prayers from you. (x2)
O Mary, we love you;
We rejoice when we say your name. (x2)
O Mary our Mother (x2)

arabic_title: يا أم النور. يا فخر الأمة

rows.english: O Mother of light, the pride of nations,
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya om al noor. Ya fakhr al ‘oma
rows.arabic: يا أم النور. يا فخر الأمة

rows.english: the beginning of joy, the treasure of grace,
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya bad’ alseroor. Ya kanz al ne3ma
rows.arabic: يا بدء السرور. يا كنز النعمة

rows.english: the source of happiness, origin of mercy,
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya ‘asl al7ebor. Ya ma3dan al ra7ma
rows.arabic: يا أصل الحبور. يا معدن الرحمة

rows.english: O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.
The exalted, living, worshipped Lord,
honored you with perfection, O daughter of David,
and Gabriel visited you, with the promised mystery,
O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.
He granted you blessedness, by the descent of the Grace,
by a wondrous mystery, you bore the Word,
and He saved every grievous soul, from the bond of darkness,
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Anqaz kol ka’eeb. Men deeq elzolma
rows.arabic: أنقذ كل كئيب من ضيق الظلمة

rows.english: O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.
Hail to you, O rod of Aaron,
blessed are you, O daughter of Zion.
The righteous rejoice at your name,
O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.
Rejoice O Mary, O chosen bride,
O honored seed, and dome and tower,
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya nasl mokarram. Qobba wa manara

rows.english: O exalted root, of all purity,
O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.
You became as the heavens, carrying the Holy One
Nobler than the powers and higher than the ranks
rows.arabic: أشرف من القوات عالية عن الطقوس

rows.english: We ask your intercessions before our Lord Jesus
O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.
We ask you O Virgin, O crown of Israel,
O joy of the martyrs, O origin of rejoicing.
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya fara7 al shohada’. Ya asl altahleel
rows.arabic: يا فرح الشهداء. يا أصل التهليل

rows.english: Intercession and victory, before Emmanuel,
O Mary, the daughter of Joachim.
O seeker to meet Jesus
Forget your hanger and thirst
Your food is the bread of life
And you´ll drink from his wounded side
You traveller forget the past
And go steadfast in the path
If you suffer on the road
Remember for you he died
The trumpet will be heard soon
With happiness and sound of joy
A great feast above the clouds
And a crown for the watchful
He´ll prepare a place for you
He is always waiting for you
His heart is longing for you
Blessed are you if you are prepared
You are a part in Jesus Christ
You who lives among the rocks
Have no fear from all dangers
You´re protected by the Lord
O seeker to meet Jesus
Forget your hanger and thirst
Your food is the bread of life
And you´ll drink from his wounded side

english_title: O Thou whose presence delighteth my soul

rows.english: O Thou whose presence delighteth my soul
And whom in my distress I call
My comfort by day and my refuge by night
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Naharan ta'azzi wa fee al-layl raqeeb

rows.english: My stronghold whenever I fall.
Shepherd of my soul I beg Thee to tell
Where thou keepest thy sheep to rest
For why should I roam in the valley of tears
And wander as one who is lost.
I ask thee to tell me daughters of Zion
Have ye seen the One I adore
I seek him in vain in the night of my soul
But now I can find Him no more.
Shepherd of my soul I shall follow Thee
O how sweet Thy voice is to me
So guide me and lead me and show me the way
My only desire is Thee.
I am my beloved's and He is mine
He calleth me sister and bride
O how do I long for the day we shall wed
In heaven in His Father's house.
O Virgin Mary, you're exalted
Above the sun and moon,
And higher than all the stars
That glow in heaven (2x)
O morning star that shines
In our churches,
And enlightens our hearts and minds
And our senses (2x)
O Mother of Jesus Christ
My refuge and my gain
Do not forsake me when I'm in
The depths of sin (2x)
You're my help and support in all
My tribulations
And a light to my heart
Whenever it weakens (2x)

english_title: O Virgin My Mother shine with your radiance
arabic_title: يا عذرا يا أمي، طلى بنورك طلى

rows.english: O Virgin My Mother,
shine with your radiance please shine.
Shine with mercy please shine,
my intercessor and helper.
(If I feel alone in this world
You are always there for me) x2
O Virgin, my Mother. (x3)
O our Queen in heaven,
you’re the greatest among all women.
In times of trouble and heartache,
be a helper for our sake.
(Abide with us at all times
We have comfort in your presence) x2
O Virgin, my Mother. (x3)
O intercessor for everyone
blessed Mother of the Holy One.
You always answer my cry;
be always by my side.
(All of the world exalts you,
The congregation and the clergy too) x2
O Virgin, my Mother. (x3)
O you great second Heaven,
O censor of compassion.
When we entreat in distress
you, gently, come and give us rest.
(At all times, we beseech you
to comfort those who are lost) (x2)
O Virgin, my Mother. (x3)

english_title: O You Who Received the Most Honorable Gift

rows.english: O you who received
the most honorable gift.
He sent you O Mary,
His Holy Spirit.
With Him, we rejoiced
and prospered.
With Him, we reconciled O Mary,
and won the case.
The fruit of your womb
filled you with grace.
He created you, O Mary
pure and unblemished.
O you who received
the most honorable gift.
He sent you O Mary,
His Holy Spirit.
Our strength fainted,
our light doomed.
But He came O Mary,
your Son the Messiah.
The God of creation,
the giver of gifts,
the forgiver of sins O Mary,
the redeemer of humanity.
O you who received
the most honorable gift.
He sent you O Mary,
His Holy Spirit.
Your humanity
were saved.
The Lord made it, O Mary
a heavenly flesh.
A censer and an ark,
a tabernacle for the divinity.
Our nature is steadfast O Mary,
Abiding in the divinity.
O you who received
the most honorable gift.
He sent you O Mary,
His Holy Spirit.
There was no intercessor
for all were silent.
So the One who hears came from you, O Mary,
O pure lady.
Peace returned
and we felt secure.
When the Judge sent O Mary
the heavenly annunciation.
O you who received
the most honorable gift.
He sent you O Mary,
His Holy Spirit.
You surpassed the creation
and manifested the truth.
From every affliction O Mary,
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Wa men kol deqa ya mariam

rows.english: you helped mankind.
O pure
and chase Virgin.
O the fortress queen O Mary
Have pity on me.
O you who received
the most honorable gift.
He sent you O Mary,
His Holy Spirit.

rows.arabic: أمنا يا عذراء - يا أم المسيح
يا للى فيك دايمًا - بيحلو المديح

rows.english: Over the domes, come look and see,
the luminous beautiful pure mother,
standing looking out, our Lady of light,
our lady the Virgin and Treasure. (x2)
Praise her O people, come and see her,
light your candles and venerate her. (x2)
Pave her way with roses and with petals. (x2)
God’s grace filled her she’s God’s vessel,
our lady the virgin and treasure.
Over the domes, come look and see,
the luminous beautiful pure mother,
standing looking out, our Lady of light,
our lady the Virgin and Treasure. (x2)
The Pure Virgin’s always with us, (x2)
her radiant light gathering us.
Healing ailments with intercessions,
all hearts rejoicing together (x2)
Our Lady the Virgin and Treasure
rows.arabic: يا ست يا عدرا يا جوهرة

rows.english: Over the domes, come look and see,
the luminous beautiful pure mother,
standing looking out, our Lady of light,
our lady the Virgin and Treasure. (x2)

rows.arabic: يا ست يا عدرا يا جوهرة

rows.english: Over the domes, come look and see,
the luminous beautiful pure mother,
standing looking out, our Lady of light,
our lady the Virgin and Treasure. (x2)

rows.arabic: يا ست يا عدرا يا جوهرة

rows.english: Over the domes, come look and see,
the luminous beautiful pure mother,
standing looking out, our Lady of light,
our lady the Virgin and Treasure. (x2)
Shepherd of my soul I shall follow Thee,
Oh, how sweet Thy voice is to me!
So guide me and lead me and show me the way,
My only desire is Thee.
I am my Beloved's and He is mine,
He calleth me sister and spouse,
Oh, how do I long for the day we shall wed,
In heaven in His Father's house.
Oh Thou Whose presence delighteth my soul,
And Whom in my distress I call,
My comfort by day and my refuge by night,
My stronghold whenever I fall.
Shepherd of my soul I beg Thee to tell,
Where Thou keepest Thy sheep to rest,
For why should I roam in the valley of tears,
And wander as one who is lost?
I ask thee to tell me daughters of Zion:
Have ye seen the One I adore?
I seek Him in vain in the night of my soul,
But lo, I can find Him no more.
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Our church of Christ
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
In celebrating your Martyrs, the righteous and saints!
rows.arabic: في عيد شهدائك عيد شهدائك الابرار القديسين

rows.english: Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Our church of Christ
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
Their blood was shed for their faith in our God and savior
rows.enPhonicsSongs: El-dam sal lama sal anhar dam el-shohada
rows.arabic: الدم سال ياما سال انهار دم الشهداء

rows.english: Jesus Christ! Jesus Christ! Jesus Christ!
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Dam al-abrar, dam al-at-har, dam al-abtal
rows.arabic: دم الابرار دم الاطهار دم الابطال

rows.english: Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Our church of Christ
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
In the Nayrouz, commemorating your saintly Martyrs!
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Fi el-Nayrouz el-Nayrouz zekra el-shohada al-qaddisin
rows.arabic: فى النيروز النيروز ذكرى الشهداء القديسين

rows.english: Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Our church of Christ
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
O God our Lord, keep us in your faith and in your love
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya Rabb e7faz lena imanena wa e7faz lena batrakena
rows.arabic: يا رب احفظ لينا ايمانا واحفظ لينا بطركنا

rows.english: Forever! and ever! and ever!
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Our church of Christ
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
O God our Lord, protect our pope and our beloved church
rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya Rabb e7faz lena imanena wa e7faz lena batrakena
rows.arabic: يا رب احفظ لينا ايمانا واحفظ لينا بطركنا

rows.english: Forever! and ever! and ever!
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Our church of Christ
Shine Bright! Shine Bright! Shine Bright!
The glory of Mary is magnified,
from sunrise to sunset.
Honor her and magnify her;
let her reign over your hearts.
She is the highest shing star;
her brightness lasts forever.
She said when annunciated,
“Let all nations bless me.”
The glory of Mary is magnified,
from sunrise to sunset.
Honor her and magnify her;
let her reign over your hearts.
The angel said, “The Holy Spirit
shall come upon you,
and the power of the Highest
shall overshadow you.”
The glory of Mary is magnified,
from sunrise to sunset.
Honor her and magnify her;
let her reign over your hearts.
She is our hope when we are hopeless.
Try to listen, O sinners;
have no fear to go to Mary,
and ask her for shelter.
The glory of Mary is magnified,
from sunrise to sunset.
Honor her and magnify her;
let her reign over your hearts.
She is known to all her children
as a safe shelter.
Seek her and you’ll find that
to your aid she is at hand.
The glory of Mary is magnified,
from sunrise to sunset.
Honor her and magnify her;
let her reign over your hearts.
Remember us and have pity;
pity of a mother to her sons.
Accept us and count us
among the true believers.
The glory of Mary is magnified,
from sunrise to sunset.
Honor her and magnify her;
let her reign over your hearts.
Help us and guide us
Towards the true faith
Grant us a favor, and you’ll find
In your son’s goodwill, joy entwined.
The glory of Mary is magnified,
from sunrise to sunset.
Honor her and magnify her;
let her reign over your hearts.
Don’t tire of praying
For the lost to return
Guide and teach them
You are their true refuge
The glory of Mary is magnified,
from sunrise to sunset.
Honor her and magnify her;
let her reign over your hearts.
And we ask to be granted,
the eternal happiness,
where we will hear the repeated,
praise of your glorious name.
The glory of Mary is magnified,
from sunrise to sunset.
Honor her and magnify her;
let her reign over your hearts.
The Lord is my shepherd
So I need nothing else
even if I walk in the valley
or in the shadows of death
I will never fear anything
with a shepherd next to me
I will never fear anything
with Jesus leading me
From your spirit fill me with joy
Help me walk with you O my Lord
Protect me from any evil thought
Heal my soul O my dear Lord!
I have confidence in Jesus
in bad times He comes to save me
and if someday my soul weakens
He's always there to protect me!

english_title: The Lord is my shepherd I shall be well supplied

rows.english: The Lord is my shepherd
I shall be well supplied
Since He is mine and I am His
What can I want beside (x2)
He leads me to the place
Where heavenly pastures grow
Where living waters gently pass
And full salvation flows (x2)
If ever I go astray
He doth my soul reclaim
And guides me in His own right way
For His most Holy Name (x2)
While he offers His aid
I cannot yield to fear
Though I should walk through death’s dark shade
My Shepherd’s with me here (x2)
In sight of all my foes
Though dost a table spread
My cup with blessing overflows
And joy exalts my head (x2)
The bounties of my love
Shall crown my following days
Nor from Thy house will I remove
Nor cease to speak Thy praise (x2)
Truly risen is the King of Peace,
Alleluia, Alleluia to the Risen Lord.
Mary went on Sunday at the time of dawn,
carrying for the body spice and incense.
She found the stone already rolled away,
And Christ is risen and He conquered.
But Mary was outside weeping,
Crying, looking at the empty grave.
She saw Jesus as a strange man,
Knowing not that He is the Beloved One.
While crying she asked O Master,
Where can I find my Lord and Beloved.
He said to her O Mary rejoice,
Go and tell My brothers and My sisters.
Mary went to His beloved disciples
Proclaiming that Jesus is risen.
Jesus Himself truly came among them,
And He said to them, "Peace be unto you."
He showed them His hands and also His side,
They rejoiced in seeing the Beloved Lord.
Alleluia, this news is very true,
Alleluia, He is risen and He conquered.
Alleluia, for the Savior of mankind,
Alleluia He has crushed the might of death.
Alleluia risen is the King of Peace,
Alleluia, Alleluia to the risen Lord.
Very early Sunday morning,
While the guards were still asleep,
[ Jesus is risen declaring,
Victory no more defeat] x2
Resurrection is my song,
Resurrection gave me life,
[ Resurrection made me strong,
Jesus my Lord is alive.] (x2)
Jesus is risen in glory,
Heaven and earth sang and praised,
[ And the angel told the story,
He is risen as He said.] (x2)
Mary Magdalene was looking,
In the garden for her Lord,
[ While Jesus Himself was telling,
Her to go and spread the word.] (x2)
Resurrection is my song,
Resurrection gave me life,
[ Resurrection made me strong,
Jesus my Lord is alive.] (x2)
All the disciples were praying,
They were really in great fear,
[ When Mary came to them saying,
He is risen He is not here.] (x2)
While they were in the room,
Jesus Christ Himself appeared,
[ My peace I give to you,
And My peace with you I leave.] (x2)
Resurrection is my song,
Resurrection gave me life,
[ Resurrection made me strong,
Jesus my Lord is alive.] (x2)
But Thomas did not believe,
What the disciples had seen,
[ So Jesus again appeared,
Showed him the place of the spear. (x2)
The heavenly hosts were singing,
Welcoming our Glorious Lord,
[ And the joy is overwhelming,
He opened the doors of hope.] (x2)
Resurrection is my song,
Resurrection gave me life,
[ Resurrection made me strong,
Jesus my Lord is alive.] (x2)
Alleluia Alleluia,
Risen is the Lord of peace.
[ Alleluia Alleluia,
Truly He is risen indeed.] (x2)
Watching us, hearing us, loving us,
she could never possibly forget us.
She’s St. Mary, Mother of Jesus who saved us.
We’re her children, and she’s always guiding us.
rows.enPhonicsSongs: We7na ekhawato we neb’a weladha we ter3ana

rows.english: She’s in heaven in her glory
The pride of all our saints (x2)
Constantly, she´s interceding
With the saints on our behalf.
Watching us, hearing us, loving us,
she could never possibly forget us.
She’s St. Mary, Mother of Jesus who saved us.
We’re her children, and she’s always guiding us.
rows.enPhonicsSongs: We7na ekhawato we neb’a weladha we ter3ana

rows.english: She´s in heaven but she appears
To her children everywhere (2)
Spreading on earth love and peace
and preserving faith for all.
Watching us, hearing us, loving us,
she could never possibly forget us.
She’s St. Mary, Mother of Jesus who saved us.
We’re her children, and she’s always guiding us.
rows.enPhonicsSongs: We7na ekhawato we neb’a weladha we ter3ana

rows.english: She´s in heaven but she sees,
when her children are in tears (2)
Mettias was handcuffed in jail
But she came and broke the chains.
Watching us, hearing us, loving us,
she could never possibly forget us.
She’s St. Mary, Mother of Jesus who saved us.
We’re her children, and she’s always guiding us.
rows.enPhonicsSongs: We7na ekhawato we neb’a weladha we ter3ana

rows.english: She´s in heaven but she hears
the pleading of a great pope (x2)
Anba Abraam come out and meet,
the faith that moved the mountain.
Watching us, hearing us, loving us,
she could never possibly forget us.
She’s St. Mary, Mother of Jesus who saved us.
We’re her children, and she’s always guiding us.
rows.enPhonicsSongs: We7na ekhawato we neb’a weladha we ter3ana

rows.english: She´s in heaven but she leaves
many miracles where she appears. (2x)
In the church she comes and shares,
with faith we witness her care.
Watching us, hearing us, loving us,
she could never possibly forget us.
She’s St. Mary, Mother of Jesus who saved us.
We’re her children, and she’s always guiding us.
rows.enPhonicsSongs: We7na ekhawato we neb’a weladha we ter3ana

rows.english: When I feel tired
To whom shall I go
You comfort me O my Lord
I kneel and pray to you x2
When I feel sad
To whom shall I go
You give me joy O my Lord
I kneel and pray to you x2
When I feel sick
To whom shall I go
You heal me O my Lord
I kneel and pray to you x2
When I feel worried
To whom shall I go
You give me peace O my Lord
I kneel and pray to you x2

english_title: Ya om el noor ya gameela

rows.enPhonicsSongs: Ya om el noor ya gameela

rows.english: Your love, O Mary
is our greatest hope,
O Mother of the Magnified,
be our mother.
Your Son reminded you of us,
on the Cross,
He gave you to the beloved,
and gave you to us.
As our kind mother,
we take refuge in you,
Show your help, O Mary,
to your children.
Your love, O Mary
is our greatest hope,
O Mother of the Magnified,
be our mother.
When we have hope in you,
our souls you heal,
Whenever we hope from you,
in the valley of sorrow.
We ask for protection,
from all evils,
Show us your care, O Mary,
in the Day of Judgement.
Your love, O Mary
is our greatest hope,
O Mother of the Magnified,
be our mother.
O Mother of yearning,
and beautiful love,
O Door of Heaven,
delightful is your love.
The mother said,
our Savior desired,
That all your blessings, O Mary,
will be valuable.
Your love, O Mary
is our greatest hope,
O Mother of the Magnified,
be our mother.
The fortune of the servants,
O Mary, is not,
Like a day in torment,
with the unbelievers.
Show us your glory,
in every challenge,
He who comes to you, O Mary,
is asking for your aid.
Your love, O Mary
is our greatest hope,
O Mother of the Magnified,
be our mother.
